name: Block Dudette
description:
An homage to Brandon Sterner's "Block Dude" for the TI-83 calculator.

Use blocks to find the exit in order to... what was the point of the original game? Let's go with "find true love".

Notes:

  • There is no sound because the TI-83 had no sound and not because I'm lazy probably.
  • For best viewing experience, please click "Fullscreen"!
  • The game will save your progress in your browser's local cache, so feel free to quit and come back later.

Controls:
Left/Right - Move
Up - Climb
Down - Pickup/Drop
X - Reset at Checkpoint
Z - *redacted spoilers*

Made with Pico-8/Lua.
